title: Ground News - Apple goes in-depth on how it's turning the Mac into a leading gaming platform
text:
Summary by Ground News Apple has offered an inside look at its work to turn the Mac into a powerful gaming platform. The interview comes as Apple has put a major emphasis on gaming throughout the year on the Mac and iPhone. For example, the Game Porting Toolkit that launched as part of macOS Sonoma makes it significantly easier for developers to bring games from other platforms to the Mac. Share menu More
